Articles.Content: Could someone make a Module Manager config that would allow the use of the KW Rocketry sound effects on stock parts? Or just good sound effects. The Audio Replacement project used to be able to do this, but it hasn't been updated since something like 0.23.

I was thinking about scratching this itch for myself. Might have time to look into this weekend, but it should be possible to swap any engine using the stock sounds with size/type appropriate KW sounds.
